shop.name: Class Outfitters
shop.whoAreWe: Contextual advertising programs sometimes have strict policies that need to be adhered too. Let’s take Google as an example.
shop.whatWeDo: In this digital generation where information can be easily obtained within seconds, business cards still have retained their importance.
shop.whyChooseUs: A two or three storey house is the ideal way to maximise the piece of earth on which our home sits, but for older or infirm people.

quote.author: Augusta Schultz
quote.content: “Going out after work? Take your butane curling iron with you to the office, heat it up, style your hair before you leave the office and you won’t have to make a trip back home.”

details.shippingAndReturns: Class Outfitters covers the postage for shipping. Orders with several products may be shipped separately. Please note that charges for return shipments will apply. Standard Shipping – $ 0 Immediately available articles are usually delivered by within 8-12 working days. If the returns label is missing from your delivery, you can always request a new one from our customer service. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions:

For orders over BGN 29.90, delivery is free. If the value of the order is lower, delivery charges of BGN 4.90 including VAT per order apply. For orders containing several products, it is possible, in some cases, to be delivered in more than one package. In case the return label is not attached to your shipment, you can order a new one by contacting our customer service department.

Standard Shipping – $ 0 Immediately available articles are usually delivered by within 8-12 working days. If the returns label is missing from your delivery, you can always request a new one from our customer service.

For orders over $60.90, delivery is free. If the value of the order is lower, delivery charges of $8.90 including VAT per order apply. For orders containing several products, it is possible, in some cases, to be delivered in more than one package. Delivery with Econt All available items can be delivered with our Econt partners within 4-6 working days. In case the return label is not attached to your shipment, you can order a new one by contacting our customer service department
